subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: In the Tour de France’s 14th stage, at least 30 riders were disrupted after tacks and small nails were tossed on the road, but Bradley Wiggins kept his overall lead.
snippet: In the Tour de France’s 14th stage, at least 30 riders were disrupted after tacks and small nails were tossed on the road, but Bradley Wiggins kept his overall lead.
